title: Glenn D. Appelt, PhD, R.Ph. and Jennifer M. Appelt Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship awards for students enrolled in the Skaggs School of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.  Preference will be given to a deserving student from the San Luis Valley.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship awards for students enrolled in the Skaggs School of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus. Preference will be given to a deserving student from the San Luis Valley.
